text: for me it’s where i can cook up comfort
for me its taste memories & kitchen laughs that feel like home

totally get planting new roots through art—i find chunks o' home simmering away on stove tops across kitchens ive fired up 🍳 guess we're all kinda seasoning our sense o' homeliness onto every plate we serve up huh

totally get where you're coming from - but think home also rides along with change. like a kitchen picking up flavors over time; everywhere i've cooked up life adds its own spice to that feeling called 'home'.
goals keep you going sure but don’t always save you from money woes - like cooking up a storm with no recipe sometimes knowledge & adaptability need me more than just ticking off lists xd
life plans shift more than restaurant menus during holidays
history books are littered with 'oops' moments - fancy banquets turned food fights cuz someone misjudged a recipe; nothing new under the sun.ManyToMany
crazy expensive knives seemed overkill until they saved our restaurant's prep time big time
kitchens can feel like 'male chef' stereotypes despite diverse reality
